word: PSALM 78:54: “AND HE BROUGHT THEM [HIS PEOPLE] TO THE BORDER OF HIS SANCTUARY, EVEN TO THIS MOUNTAIN, WHICH HIS RIGHT HAND HAD PURCHASED.” THE MOUNTAIN WAS MOUNT MORIAH, ON WHICH THE TEMPLE OF SOLOMON WAS BUILT; YET BEING BROUGHT UNTO IT IS CALLED BEING BROUGHT “TO THE BORDER OF HIS SANCTUARY.” THUS THESE TEXTS DO NOT PROVE THAT THE EARTH IS THE SANCTUARY, BUT RATHER THE REVERSE.
